name: Foxhaven
description:
Foxhaven is an online multiplayer game designed for 3 vs 1 3D action multi-player game.

In this game, 4 players participate, with 1 player assuming the role of THE FOX.

The objective is for the villagers to escape from the village without falling victim to THE FOX's schemes.
To do so, they must find 6 keys scattered throughout the village.

The central conflict revolves around the villagers' goal to identify who among them is THE FOX and to share this crucial information with their fellow players. Meanwhile, THE FOX aims to eliminate all the villagers before they can escape.

Effective communication is pivotal for the villagers as they must swiftly discern the identity of THE FOX and disseminate this information to all players. Conversely, THE FOX endeavors to maintain a covert identity while discreetly eliminating villagers one by one.

Can you escape from Foxhaven Village?
